div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Mar. 8, 1915. A PUBLIC PERFORMANCE OF SOKOL CHICAGO

body.p: The spacious hall of Sokol Chicago was full of life and stir yesterday afternoon and evening. The ambitious and agile Sokol unit gave a performance to show the results of its physical and mental training during the last twelve months. The production was as successful as anybody, even the unit's conscientious teacher and drill master, Brother Tomas Kocka, could desire.....
